superCharge.make-your-website-hop-like-a-gowaf: Make your website hop like a Gowaf
superCharge.text0: Turn your website from a snail into a Gowaf. Deliver the best possible experience to your users with our global CDN and optimizer service. Speed up your website and hop ahead of the competition.
superCharge.text3: Reliable video CDN that truly hops
superCharge.text4: Solve the hassle of video delivery by packing transcoding, storage, security, and video player into a powerful but straightforward package. Stream anywhere. Without buffering!
superCharge.text8: Supercharge your software downloads worldwide with one of the fastest global networks. Experience high throughput by bringing your content closer to your users anywhere.
superCharge.text11: Transform your images. On the fly.
superCharge.text12: Resize, crop, sharpen, and transform images on the fly with an ultra-fast processing engine Gowaf on 123 datacenters worldwide. Simplify development & optimize SEO by reducing image size by up to 80%.

table.title: Outage Credits
